name: mikroe.click.adc19
short_description: ADC 19 Click is a compact add-on board that contains a high-performance data converter. This board features the ADC122S101, a low-power two-channel CMOS 12-bit analog-to-digital converter from Texas Instruments. This SPI configurable analog-to-digital converter (ADC) is fully specified over a sample rate range of 500ksps to 1Msps, offering high reliability and performance. The converter is based on a successive-approximation register architecture with an internal track-and-hold circuit configurable to accept one or two input signals at its input channels.
